item.title: [GRA3/5/7/9/11][Public Cloud] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 16, 20:00 UTC  -  Sep 17, 04:00 UTC

Aug 30, 13:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect Latency.

Start time : 16/09/2024 20:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except in rare case latencies may be noted to reach PCI instances running
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)
The critical phase of this upgrade is tentatively scheduled between 10:30 PM UTC and 12:00 AM UTC. We are not expecting any impact. However in case of an issue the rollback can be managed in less than 30 minutes.

item.title: [Global][Public Cloud] - VPS reinstallation issue
item.description:
Aug 30, 16:04 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/08/2024 19:10 UTC
End time : 30/08/2024 15:40 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to internal maintenance.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 30, 14:52 UTC
Identified - Our teams have identified the source of the incident, and a fix is currently being tested.

Aug 30, 12:51 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 30, 04:54 UTC
Update - Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it.

Aug 29, 21:12 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 29, 20:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 29/08/2024 19:10 UTC
Service impact : Please note that during a VPS installation or reinstallation, customers who provides an SSH key but does not request a password to access their instance, will be unable to access their instance.
Workaround : In order to resolve this issue, the customer can provide an SSH key and request the password by mail.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA/BHS][LogsDataPlatform] - OpenSearch upgrade notification
item.description:
Aug 27, 15:59 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 27, 14:51 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will take more time than expected.
Below you can find the new information regarding the operation.

Start time : 27/08/2024 12:00 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 16:00 UTC
Service Impact : Logs ingestion will be lagging for 60 minutes and OpenSearch API and OpenSearch Dashboards will be unavailable for 60 minutes during the maintenance.
Graylog API and WebUI will still be available.
Service improvement : As Part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform a major upgrade on OpenSearch and OpenSearch Dashboards from version 1 to 2.

Aug 27, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 13, 15:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/08/2024 12:00 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service Impact : Logs ingestion will be lagging for 60 minutes and OpenSearch API and OpenSearch Dashboards will be unavailable for 60 minutes during the maintenance.
Graylog API and WebUI will still be available.
Service improvement : As Part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform a major upgrade on OpenSearch and OpenSearch Dashboards from version 1 to 2.

Thank you for your understanding.
